thread.title: A Manhattan Landlord Connects With Online Retail Upstarts

author: Esther Fung
title: A Manhattan Landlord Connects With Online Retail Upstarts
text:
Empty storefronts are plaguing a number of Manhattan high-street retail corridors, but one landlord is carving out a new niche.
The Feil Organization, a private commercial real-estate firm, has signed four web-based menswear retailers at 488 Madison Ave., making it a destination for shoppers looking to feel the physical products and see how they actually fit.
